attributes.action: honour the late Tony Hart with a posthumous Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age where knighthoods are seemingly bestowed on anyone and everyone, we feel that this legend of television deserves recognition for the joy and inspiration he gave to millions of lives, both young and old.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
